substances.name: Bleem
substances.description: Bleem is a mysterious, otherworldly name native to the planet Xeridia-III. Its unique properties and behaviors defy human understanding.

substances.name: Flaglurg
substances.description: Flaglurg is a rare, sentient and shape-shifting name indigenous to planet Zorvath, a distant world in the outer rim of the Andromeda galaxy.

substances.name: Sklerm
substances.description: Sklerm is a fascinating, extraterrestrial material found on planet Kyreth-IV, renowned for its unique properties and potential applications.
